Key Match Events: India were bowled out for 102 in response to Zimbabwe's 115/9
Post-Match Reflections: Shubman Gill expressed disappointment with the batting effort and his own dismissal
Gill felt that he should have carried his bat through the match
Gill stated that the team could not execute their plans
Miscellaneous Highlights: Zimbabwe beat India by 13 runs in the first T20I match of the five-match series
